description: A real-time handwritten number detection application built using Python and Machine Learning, featuring digit classification with bounding box visualization using Pygame. Frameworks and libraries used - Python, TensorFlow/Keras, NumPy, OpenCV, Pygame
Kotlin Machine Learning Framework Project

SaxtonAlgo is a modular Python framework for researching, backtesting, and deploying algorithmic trading strategies. It includes a custom backtesting engine, robust performance and risk analytics, machine-learningdriven alpha models, and live/paper-trading integration through the Alpaca API.

Machine Learning Framework that predicts cognitive load, burnout probability and performance drop using engineered HR behavioral signals, ensemble regression models and unsupervised clustering to generate data-driven task allocation insights for workforce optimization.

An advanced machine learning framework using XGBoost to predict corporate default risk. Features a Streamlit dashboard for real-time risk assessment, detailed financial visualizations, and an automated benchmark of 13 ML algorithms. Replaces subjective judgment with data-driven probability.
DeepGNN is a framework for training machine learning models on large scale graph data.
This is my Computer Vision project. It is a image classification using Tensorflow and Keras frameworks. The dataset used in this project is CIFAR-10
A complete, production-ready machine learning pipeline for predicting MOF (Metal-Organic Framework) formation energy from synthesis parameters and surface chemistry.

This project presents a hybrid AIOps framework that enhances the reliability of cloud-native systems by integrating Kubernetes autoscaling with machine learning-based anomaly detection and remediation. The framework enables autonomous system management, reducing downtime and improving performance through proactive and intelligent operations.
A curated list of awesome Machine Learning frameworks, libraries and software. With repository stars and forks
An Network Intrusion Detection Framework using Machine Learning Approach

This repository contains an experimental trading-bot framework built around machine learning, computer vision and stochastic modelling, with the goal of helping evaluate stocks (undervalued / fairly valued / overvalued) and ultimately support automated trading decisions.

This project is a Machine Learning web application built using Streamlit that predicts the species of an Iris flower based on user-provided measurements.  The application demonstrates how a trained ML model can be quickly deployed as an interactive web app using pure Python, without any frontend frameworks.
In this repository different AI/ML algorithms are implemented by using PyTorch framework for learning purpose.

Machine-learningdriven churn prediction and risk-based customer segmentation for an e-commerce retailer. Includes Random Forest modelling, RFM-style behavioural clustering, value-based risk bands, and CLV-aware retention strategy design.
A machine learning framework using active learning strategies to accelerate the design of BCC solid solution high-entropy alloys

This Python script is a complete backend for a web application built using the Flask framework. Its central purpose is to power an AI-driven title generator by exposing a machine learning model through a simple web API.

This project successfully delivers a clean, simple, and effective FAQ chatbot that provides a solid foundation for understanding core machine learning concepts without relying on complex frameworks or dependencies.
Forecasting S&P 500 realized volatility using econometric and machine-learning models under a strict walk-forward framework, highlighting the role of nonlinear interactions and regime dependence.
Predict football match outcomes using the W-5 Multi-Agent AI Consensus Framework, achieving high accuracy with a blend of AI and machine learning techniques.
Repository associated with article "Flexible Framework for Surface Hopping: From Hybrid Schemes for Machine Learning to Benchmarkable Nonadiabatic Dynamics"
Research framework for exploring machine learning techniques applied to quantum systems, including MPS, VQE, generative models, and quantum-aware architectures.

Machine learning and single-cell transcriptomic analysis framework for characterizing platelet subpopulations in COVID-19, Sepsis, and SLE, revealing novel prognostic biomarkers and therapeutic targets.

Space Labs AI presents: A radiation-tolerant machine learning framework enabling neural networks to operate reliably in space environments. Features adaptive protection, Reed-Solomon error correction, and breakthrough architecture optimizations that improve performance under radiation.

This project builds a complete data pipeline using NumPy only  no Pandas, no sklearn, no ML frameworks. It simulates a real Machine Learning preprocessing workflow entirely from scratch to develop deep intuition before training actual models.
iHeartML: An Interpretable Machine Learning Framework for Early Heart Failure Mortality Prediction
Code for Predicting Content Virality through Integrated Machine Learning and Network Diffusion Modeling
Distributed service framework using asynchronous messages supporting IoT, Machine Learning and Video
This is a methodological framework to model Cultural Ecosystem Services at large scales. It is composed by an Artificial Intelligence and a Machine Learning model.
Automation framework for machine learning, forecasting, model evaluation, and interpretation.

This repository contains source code for predicting HIV/AIDS spread patterns in Indonesia using a hybrid machine learning approach combining clustering and classification, developed under the CRISP-DM framework.
Hybrid Quantum Machine Learning and Post-Quantum Cryptography framework for secure and intelligent railway traffic prediction
Framework for machine learning with spiking neural networks

STAR-XPLAIN is an Explainable AI framework for interpretable analysis of astronomical light curves, combining classical machine learning, deep learning, and XAI methods to connect model predictions with physical astrophysical features.
A Go-based framework for real-time monitoring, explanation, and drift detection of deployed machine learning models.

MLOptimizer is a comprehensive framework for automatically generating optimized machine learning models while capturing detailed hardware performance metrics. It provides a distributed system for model training, hyperparameter optimization, and hardware resource monitoring.

This project is a Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) and Machine Learning Tool for Predicting CO Equivalent Emissions in the Textile Industry. It provides a data-driven framework to analyze and forecast the environmental impact of various textile materials and processes.

This project presents an end-to-end machine learning framework for predicting NFL Draft outcomes using collegiate performance data utilizing over 17,000 NCAA players collected from the CollegeFootballData API.

An open-source dataset of synthetic power quality disturbances (PQD), ideal for training and validating machine learning models. Signals are generated using established mathematical models from scientific literature, with parameter ranges conforming to the IEEE 1159 standard. Includes a Python analysis framework for statistical exploration.
Quantum Transfer Learning (QTL) framework for radiographic fracture detection. Benchmarking ResNet, VGG, and DenseNet with Variational Quantum Circuits (VQC).
Framework for solving discrete optimization problems using a combination of Mixed-Integer Linear Programming (MIP) and Machine Learning (ML)

A machine learningbased malware detection framework was developed to classify benign and malicious executables. Selected discriminative features were used to train multiple classifiers. Evaluation using accuracy and ROCAUC shows that ensemble models achieve superior detection performance.

I'm a Results-driven Software Engineer with expertise in computer vision and machine learning applications. My journey in tech has been fueled by a passion for creating intelligent systems that solve real-world problems.  With a strong background in Python programming, deep learning frameworks, and image processing technologies.

This project focuses on predicting the severity of Social Anxiety Disorder (SAD) using a multi-modal machine learning framework. The dataset integrates demographic, lifestyle, psychological, and physiological features. Several models were developed and compared, including Random Forest, XGBoost, Support Vector Classifier (SVC).
macecvs is a Python package that leverages machine learning toolds and the MACE framework for the definitions of collective variable.

A comprehensive Python framework for automated data analysis, machine learning, and AI-powered insights. Features AutoML, explainable AI (SHAP/LIME), time series forecasting, interactive dashboards, and automated report generation.

A comprehensive machine learning system for predicting and preventing player churn in gaming applications. This end-to-end solution includes data pipelines, ML models, real-time APIs, interactive dashboards, and A/B testing frameworks.

Proposed an automated framework combining machine vision and machine learning to assess cognitive biases in decision-making. Eye-tracking, facial expressions, and behavioral data were used to model risk tendencies. Results revealed distinct bias patterns across risk groups, supporting data-driven decision analysis.
Translation exploration with Transformers and Machine Learning Experimentation Platfroms
A comprehensive machine learning framework for quantitative trading strategies

CTVAM (Cybersecurity Threat & Vulnerability Analysis Model) is a modular framework for ingesting NVD CVE data, preprocessing vulnerability metrics, performing feature engineering, generating analytics, and applying machine-learning models for severity prediction and risk insights.
Learning and implementing machine learning algorithms, concepts, and real-world projects using Python.

A computational statistics framework for predicting Customer Lifetime Value (CLV) in e-commerce using data-driven models, machine learning, and statistical analysis to estimate customer behavior, retention, and long-term value.
A curated list of frameworks, platforms, tools, research, and learning resources for Automated Machine Learning (AutoML).

Unsupervised machine learning and geospatial analytics framework for clustering global cities based on sustainability, ESG, infrastructure, and climate-resilience indicators to support smart-city planning and public-policy decision modeling.

A curated portfolio of AI, Machine Learning, and Automation projects showcasing expertise in deep learning, NLP, web scraping, and data visualization. Includes work on recommendation systems, face embeddings, financial forecasting, and applied AI solutions built with Python, FastAPI, Django, and modern ML frameworks.
A Framework for Developing Robust Machine Learning Models in Harsh Environments
MetaSelect utilizes OpenML datasets and a MetaLearner framework to predict and recommend the best-performing machine learning algorithm along with optimized hyperparameters for any given dataset.
nterpretable Multi-Horizon Machine Learning Framework for PM2.5 Forecasting in Tashkent: Toward Early-Warning Air Quality Management

This project presents a data-driven framework designed to optimise healthcare resource allocation across Chinese prefecture-level cities using advanced predictive analytics and machine learning techniques. Healthcare resource allocation has become increasingly complex due to growing populations, regional inequalities, and dynamic healthcare demands
Interpretable machine learning framework for designing Nb-Si based ultra-high temperature alloys with enhanced fracture toughness (>20 MPam^1/2)

Machine learning framework for inflammation severity assessment using histopathology features, implementing GroupKFold cross-validation, Pipeline structure, feature selection, ensemble models, hyperparameter tuning, and SHAP-based interpretability for multi-class and binary classification tasks.

A machine learning framework to predict VLSI circuit delays from RTL metrics. Using 20 designs and ensemble techniques, it achieved 3.28% MAPEfar better than the 10% target. The system integrates multiple models, Bayesian optimization, SHAP explainability, delivers a production API with 12ms latency and 90% confidence intervals.
An automated machine learning (AutoML) framework that uses Genetic Algorithms (GAs) to efficiently select the optimal ML algorithm and hyperparameters for a given dataset.
A cloud-agnostic framework for industrial predictive maintenance using Edge Computing and Machine Learning

The work proposes a comparative machine learning framework for predicting salaries in global AI job market using diverse job-related features. Several regression models, including Linear Regression, Ridge, Lasso, ElasticNet, Random Forest and Gradient Boosting are evaluated using an 80/20 traintest split with 10-fold cross-validation.
A machine learning framework for probabilistic world modeling, uncertainty-aware reasoning, and real-time decision-making in dynamic, high-uncertainty environments.
A unified framework for machine learning collective variables for enhanced sampling simulations

FlaMMA (Flaky Mitigation & Monitoring Approach) is a framework for detecting, mitigating, and monitoring flaky tests in real projects. It combines rerun analysis, machine learning, and automated repair strategies to improve test reliability, reduce CI instability, and support more trustworthy software testing.

An end-to-end machine learning and simulation framework that predicts fares, models price elasticity, simulates inventory-based pricing, and delivers dynamic pricing recommendations through interactive Power BI dashboards

This repository contains educational materials and code examples for learning TensorFlow, a popular open-source machine learning framework developed by Google. It provides hands-on examples covering fundamental machine learning concepts, TensorFlow basics, and core learning algorithms.

A curated collection of AI security resources, tools, frameworks, and research.  This project provides comprehensive guidance for securing AI/ML systems, from traditional machine learning to large language models and autonomous agents.
Machine learning-based classification framework for detecting spatially extended and diffuse emission in the high redshift universe, using multi-band broadband imaging.
An opinionated machine learning framework.
Transformers: the model-definition framework for state-of-the-art machine learning models in text, vision, audio, and multimodal models, for both inference and training.

Validation-driven machine learning framework where scientific constraints act as adaptive validators rather than fixed physics losses. Demonstrated on a climate downscaling example to contrast against PINN-style constraint enforcement

Alert Prioritization System using Learning-to-Rank (RankNet, LambdaRank, LambdaMART) A machine learningbased alert ranking framework that prioritizes network intrusion alerts using CIC-IDS 2017 data and LightGBM learning-to-rank algorithms, simulating real-world SOC alert triage.

This repository presents a Federated Learningbased framework for securing Internet of Medical Things (IoMT) environments. The approach enables multiple medical devices and institutions to collaboratively train machine learning models without sharing raw patient data, ensuring privacy, security, and regulatory compliance.

A robust Machine Learning framework for Network Intrusion Detection using Random Forest algorithms. Designed to classify cyber-attacks and anomalies on the KDD Cup 1999 dataset with high precision, prioritizing system safety and operational continuity.
This project implements a scale-guided multi-organ segmentation framework using statistical machine learning and a ResNet-based deep learning model.

This study proposes an explainable machine learning based crop recommendation framework designed to enhance agricultural decision making in Bangladesh.
An interpretable machine learning framework for predicting health outcomes and recommending treatments for workplace chemical exposures, featuring multi-lingual explanations powered by LLMs.
A data-driven framework for optimizing low-Reynolds number UAV airfoils using a machine learning surrogate and a genetic algorithm.
A hybrid framework for Sub-seasonal to Seasonal (S2S) weather forecasting fusing Chaos Theory and Machine Learning.

A GISMachine Learning framework to identify optimal utility-scale solar farm locations in Bengaluru by integrating spatial analysis, MCDA, and XGBoost-based solar irradiance forecasting.
Multi-Criteria Decision Making (MCDM) Framework for Building Energy Systems with Expedited Computation using Machine Learning (ML) Techniques

AI-VAPT is an autonomous, AI-driven Vulnerability Assessment & Penetration Testing (VAPT) framework designed to revolutionize cybersecurity testing. The platform combines traditional manual VAPT methodologies with neural intelligence, machine learning, and intelligent automation. It supports continuous, scalable, and context-aware vulnerability.

Developed a prognostic framework leveraging machine learning algorithms for early and accurate prediction of multiple diseases. The model integrates patient health data and clinical parameters to enhance diagnostic precision and support preventive healthcare decisions.

A personal research and experimentation repository for exploring Physics-Informed Machine Learning (PIML) using the NVIDIA PhysicsNemo framework.

A fast, distributed, high performance gradient boosting (GBT, GBDT, GBRT, GBM or MART) framework based on decision tree algorithms, used for ranking, classification and many other machine learning tasks.
A dual-layer unsupervised machine learning framework (K-Means + DBSCAN) for stratifying COVID-19 mortality risk and discovering latent clinical phenotypes using static admission data.
